Join Our Discord

About

A group in the greater Sacramento County area associated with DEF CON Groups for hackers, makers, tinkerers and security enthusiasts/professionals/students to meet and share projects/ideas. Current leader is RadicalKjax, please reach out to her or any of our social media accounts for any inquiries.

Location

Sacramento, California
United States
